article: From Monday until Friday most people are busy working or studying, but in the evenings and on weekends they are free and enjoy themselves. Some watch TV or go to the movies; others _ sports. It depends on individual _ . There are many different ways to spend our _ time. Almost everyone has _ kind of hobby. It may be _ from collecting stamps to making model airplanes. Some hobbies are very _ ; others don't _ at all. Some collections are _ a lot of money; others are valuable only _ their owners. I know a man who has a coin collection worth several thousand dollars. A short time ago he bought a rare fifty-cent piece _ $250! He was very happy about his collection and thought the price was _ . _ , my youngest brother _ match boxes. He has almost 600 of them but I doubt if they are worth any money. However, _ my brother they are extremely _ . Nothing makes him _ than to find a new match box for his collection. That's _ a hobby means, I think. It is something we like to do in our spare time simply for the _ of it. The value in dollars is not important, _ the pleasure it gives us _ .
